{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-869 |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00PVCVG5A |newegg=N82E16833127711 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/02/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRGAC54 |manuf_rev=A1 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR869A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR869A1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563 |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8337N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks (Sige);SE2576L;;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFPA5512;;3; |flags=high power |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1750 EXO Series Wi-Fi Router}} :[http://us.dlink.com/product-category/home-solutions/connect/routers/ Product page]
"8WRGAC54.0A1G" is silkscreened on the board. :See also [[D-Link DIR-859 rev A1]]..
===Overview=== *Performance – AC1750 Dual Band Wi-Fi Performance *Coverage – Extreme Coverage and Range with High Power Amplifiers *Latest technology – AC SmartBeam and SmartConnect *Unique design – Premium Stylish Design *Fast wired connections – Gigabit Ethernet Ports
===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32925-d-link-ces-2016-announcements ''D-Link CES 2016 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :[[D-Link DIR-869]] - ''AC1750 EXO Series Wi-Fi Router'' ::1300Mbps (5GHz) and 450Mbps (2.4GHz) {$129.99} :[[D-Link DIR-879]] - ''AC1900 EXO Series Wi-Fi Router'' ::1300Mbps (5GHz) and 600Mbps (2.4GHz) {$149.99} ::RTL8198CS / RTL8814AR / RTL8194AR - [http://www.anandtech.com/show/9974/dlink-demonstrates-innovative-networking-solutions-at-ces PR] *[http://us.dlink.com/press-centre/press-releases/unified-home-wi-fi-network-kit/ ''Unified Home Wi-Fi Network Kit DKT-891 - CES 2016'' on '''D-Link'''] (US) :[[D-Link DIR-891L]] - ''AC4300 Tri-Band MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router'' {$369.99} ::2x 1733Mbps (5GHz) and 800Mbps (2.4GHz), Qualcomm MU|EFX :[[D-Link DAP-1655]] - ''AC1300 Gigabit Wi-Fi Extender'' ::867Mbps (5GHz) and 450Mbps (2.4GHz)
